source:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Eurydome has a use for your unique charms.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
アナグノリシス天測園のエウリドメは、冒険者に仕事を頼みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Bureau of the Architect envoy.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_TODO_00<tab>創造物管理局の職員と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the collection of crystallized concepts to Eurydome.
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_000<tab>Oh my, aren't you adorable! Hmm... Actually, there's something you might be able to help me with.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_000<tab>ねぇ、そこの<var 08 E905 ((お嬢ちゃん)) ((僕)) /var>。
ひとつ頼まれてくれないかしらぁ？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_001<tab>A visitor from the Bureau of the Architect has arrived at Propylaion to deliver new concepts. I would like you to offer her the warmest of welcomes!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_001<tab>あのねぇ、新規に登録申請された生物のイデアを届けに、
「創造物管理局の職員」さんがプロピュライオンにいらっしゃるの。
その方を、お出迎えしてくださらない？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_002<tab>Normally, we'd have our own familiars attend to such duties, but most of them are already entertaining other guests. There's been rather a lot lately, you see.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_002<tab>今日はなんだかお客様が多くて……
いまちょっと、来客対応の使い魔が出払っちゃってるのよぉ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_003<tab>On the other hand, this would be the perfect opportunity to show her an entirely new and─What's a nice way to put this?─<var 1A 02 /var>idiosyncratic<var 1A 01 /var> familiar. That being you, of course. I'm sure she'd be delighted to meet you!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_003<tab>それに、個性的で可愛らしい使い魔が大好きな人だから、
あなたが行ってくれたらきっと喜ぶと思うのよう。
ね、お願いするわねぇ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_005<tab>Oh, you'd like some sort of description would you? Well, I believe she has a white mask and long, black robes. Does that narrow it down?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_005<tab>あのねぇ、新規に登録申請された生物のイデアを届けに、
「創造物管理局の職員」さんがプロピュライオンにいらっしゃるの。
その方を、お出迎えしてくださらない？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_010<tab>What a pleasant surprise! You must be one of the most <var 09 E948 ((staggeringly generic)) ((curiously elongated)) ((eminently portable)) ((excessively energetic)) ((astonishingly brawny)) ((bafflingly prickly)) ((luxuriously coiffured)) ((anatomically inexplicable)) /var> familiars I've ever seen!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_010<tab>あらあら、まあまあ！
なんて<var 09 E948 ((フレキシブルで)) ((エレガンスで)) ((チャーミングで)) ((パワフルで)) ((ハスキーで)) ((ミステリアスで)) ((フラッフィーで)) ((クールで)) /var>、可愛らしい使い魔さんなの！
お出迎えありがとう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_011<tab>Eurydome chose her representative well, it would appear. As a matter of fact, I too have an errand to ask of you, namely the delivery of these concepts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_011<tab>エウリドメさんが使いをよこすと言っていたのは、あなたね。
じゃあこのイデアはあなたに渡しておくから、
主人のもとまで届けてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_012<tab>I have brought them all the way from the Akadaemia Anyder. Three aquatic fauna specimens from the Words of Mitron and one flora sample from the Words of Halmarut. All <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> fascinating, as my counterparts here will soon discover.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_012<tab>アナイダ・アカデミアで考案された、
ミトロン院の水棲生物が3種、ハルマルト院の植物が1種。
今回もとびきり面白い子たちが揃っているわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_013<tab>It would also be prudent to remind Eurydome not to let their captivating nature distract her from making her observations. Well then, there's no time like the present!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_013<tab>あまりに面白いからって、観察に夢中になりすぎないように、
って「エウリドメ」さんに渡すときに伝えてもらえる？
じゃあ頼んだわね、可愛い使い魔さん。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_020<tab>I trust our guest was as enamored with you as I am?
target: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_020<tab>創造物管理局の職員さん、いらっしゃってたかしらぁ？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_021<tab>New concepts for us? And fascinating to the point of being distracting? What an odd thing to warn me about, though it does all sound rather intriguing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_021<tab>あら、イデアを引き取ってきてくれたのねぇ。
観察に夢中になりすぎないように、って、
釘をさされるくらいの子たちだなんて、とっても楽しみだわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_022<tab>The Akadaemia Anyder always produces concepts of the most outstanding quality, and I'm eager to learn what treats we have in store on this occasion. Let me see...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_022<tab>アナイダ・アカデミアは最高峰の学術機関だものねぇ。
考案されるイデアも、質が高いと評判なのよ。
ひとつ、見てみちゃおうかしら……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_023<tab>Hmm... From the Words of Mitron we have what seems to be an aquatic mollusk capable of storing aether in its shell. I can only guess as to what purpose that would serve, but I daresay all will become abundantly clear in due course.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_023<tab>ほら、これはミトロン院の、
「殻に魔力を蓄積する水棲のカタツムリ」だそうよ。
面白いことを考えるわよねぇ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_024<tab>Oh, I do apologize! I already find myself mesmerized by these concepts, just as our visitor predicted. For your part in bringing me these wonders, you have my thanks.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_024<tab>早くみんなにも共有してあげなくっちゃ。
お手伝い、本当に感謝するわぁ。
